summary.span: 包含支持在 ASP.NET 中使用缓存功能的 .NET Framework 宿主环境的类型。

span.span: Contains types that support .NET Framework hosting environments that use the caching features in ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类 公开静态 属性。The base class exposes a static property. 当 .NET Framework 宿主环境启动单个应用程序域时，它可以设置对属性的引用 。When a .NET Framework hosting environment starts individual application domains, it can set a reference to the property. 这使宿主环境能够提供与缓存更好的集成。This enables the hosting environment to provide better integration with the cache. 在中 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] ， 命名空间提供了宿主环境可用于对属性设置引用的接口 。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the namespace provides interfaces that a hosting environment can use to set a reference on the property.
